com.meterware.simpleserver

Interface ServerListener


  • public interface ServerListener
    A listener for messages received by the server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionAccepted(SocketChannel channel)
      Invoked when the server accepts a connection.
      void dataRead(Responder responder)
      Invoked when the server receives a buffer of data.
      void dataSent(int numBytes)
      Invoked after the server sends data.

    • Method Detail

      • connectionAccepted

        void connectionAccepted(SocketChannel channel)
        Invoked when the server accepts a connection.

      • dataRead

        void dataRead(Responder responder)
              throws IOException
        Invoked when the server receives a buffer of data.
        Parameters:
        responder - an object which can be used to issue a response and/or act as a key for context.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dataSent

        void dataSent(int numBytes)
        Invoked after the server sends data.
        Parameters:
        numBytes - the number of bytes sent.
